import axios from"axios";var SERVER='http://127.0.0.1:8002/api/suggestion';var headers={'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'JWT fefege..'};function suggestionAPI(data){return axios.get("".concat(SERVER,"/user/").concat(data.user_id));}function suggestionAcceptAPI(data){return axios.post("".concat(SERVER,"/accept"),JSON.stringify(data),{headers:headers});// return axios.post(`${SERVER}/accept`, JSON.stringify(data));
}function suggestionRejectAPI(data){return axios.post("".concat(SERVER,"/reject"),JSON.stringify(data),{headers:headers});}export default{suggestionAPI:suggestionAPI,suggestionAcceptAPI:suggestionAcceptAPI,suggestionRejectAPI:suggestionRejectAPI};
